source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.casereference IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                             AS NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,
    T1.casecreateddate                              AS CaseCreatedDate,
    T1.projectname                                  AS ProjectName,
    T1.projectstatus                                AS ProjectStatus,
    T1.examtimetablepublishstatus                   AS ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
    T1.sector                                       AS Sector,
    T1.projecttype                                  AS ProjectType,
    T1.stage                                        AS Stage,
    T1.casereference                                AS CaseReference,
    T1.projectLocation                              AS ProjectLocation,
    T1.projectemailaddress                          AS ProjectEmailAddress,
    T1.twitteraccountname                           AS TwitterAccountName,
    T1.region                                       AS Region,
    T1.easting                                      AS Easting,
    T1.northing                                     AS Northing,
    T1.transboundary                                AS Transboundary,
    T1.welshlanguage                                AS WelshLanguage,
    T1.exasize                                      AS ExASize,
    T1.mapzoomlevel                                 AS MapZoomLevel,
    T1.projectdescription                           AS ProjectDescription,
    T1.sos                                          AS SoS,
    T1.tene                                         AS TenE,
    T1.dateprojectappearsonwebsite                  AS DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
    T1.dateofdcoacceptance                          AS DateOfDCOAcceptance,
    T1.anticipateddateofsubmission                  AS AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
    T1.dateofdcosubmission                          AS DateOfDCOSubmission,
    T1.dateofrepresentationperiodopen               AS DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
    T1.dateofrelevantrepresentationclose            AS DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
    T1.daterrepappearonwebsite                      AS DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
    T1.confirmedstartofexamination                  AS ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
    T1.datetimeexaminationends                      AS DateTimeExaminationEnds,
    T1.stage4extensiontoexamclosedate               AS Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
    T1.stage5extensiontorecommendationdeadline      AS Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
    T1.dateofrecommendations                        AS DateOfRecommendations,
    T1.confirmeddateofdecision                      AS ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
    T1.stage5extensiontodecisiondeadline            AS Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
    T1.dateprojectwithdrawn                         AS DateProjectWithdrawn,
    T1.section46notification                        AS Section46Notification,
    T1.datepinsfirstnotifiedofproject               AS DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
    T1.screeningopinionsought                       AS ScreeningOpinionSought,
    T1.screeningopinionissued                       AS ScreeningOpinionIssued,
    T1.scopingopinionsought                         AS ScopingOpinionSought,
    T1.scopingopinionissued                         AS ScopingOpinionIssued,
    T1.deadlineforacceptancedecision                AS DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
    T1.datesection58noticereceived                  AS DateSection58NoticeReceived,
    T1.preliminarymeetingstartdate                  AS PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
    T1.deadlineforcloseofexamination                AS DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
    T1.deadlineforsubmissionofrecommendation        AS DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
    T1.deadlinefordecision                          AS DeadlineForDecision,
    T1.jrperiodenddate                              AS JRPeriodEndDate,
    T1.extensiontodaterelevantrepresentationsclose  AS ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
    T1.summary                                      AS Summary,
    T1.promotername                                 AS PromoterName,
    T1.applicantfirstname                           AS ApplicantFirstName,
    T1.applicantlastname                            AS ApplicantLastName,
    T1.addressline1                                 AS AddressLine1,
    T1.addressline2                                 AS AddressLine2,
    T1.addresstown                                  AS AddressTown,
    T1.addresscounty                                AS AddressCounty,
    T1.postcode                                     AS PostCode,
    T1.applicantemailaddress                        AS ApplicantEmailAddress,
    T1.applicantwebaddress                          AS ApplicantWebAddress,
    T1.applicantphonenumber                         AS ApplicantPhoneNumber,
    T1.applicantdescriptionofproject                AS ApplicantDescriptionOfProject,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.casecreateddate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.projectname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.projectstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.examtimetablepublishstatus,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sector,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.projecttype,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.stage,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.projectLocation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.projectemailaddress,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.twitteraccountname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.region,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.easting,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.northing,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.transboundary,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.welshlanguage,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.exasize,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.mapzoomlevel,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.projectdescription,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sos,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.tene,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateprojectappearsonwebsite,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateofdcoacceptance,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.anticipateddateofsubmission,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateofdcosubmission,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateofrepresentationperiodopen,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateofrelevantrepresentationclose,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.daterrepappearonwebsite,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.confirmedstartofexamination,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datetimeexaminationends,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.stage4extensiontoexamclosedate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.stage5extensiontorecommendationdeadline,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateofrecommendations,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.confirmeddateofdecision,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.stage5extensiontodecisiondeadline,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.dateprojectwithdrawn,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.section46notification,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datepinsfirstnotifiedofproject,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.screeningopinionsought,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.screeningopinionissued,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.scopingopinionsought,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.scopingopinionissued,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.deadlineforacceptancedecision,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datesection58noticereceived,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.deadlineforcloseofexamination,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.preliminarymeetingstartdate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.deadlineforsubmissionofrecommendation,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.deadlinefordecision,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.jrperiodenddate,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.extensiontodaterelevantrepresentationsclose,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.summary,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.promotername,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.applicantfirstname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.applicantlastname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressline1,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addressline2,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addresstown,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.addresscounty,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.applicantemailaddress,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.applicantwebaddress,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.applicantphonenumber,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.applicantdescriptionofproject,'.')
        ))                                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_data T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim T3 ON T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
        -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.casecreateddate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.projectname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.projectstatus,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.examtimetablepublishstatus,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sector,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.projecttype,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.stage,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.projectLocation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.projectemailaddress,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.twitteraccountname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.region,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.easting,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.northing,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.transboundary,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.welshlanguage,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.exasize,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.mapzoomlevel,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.projectdescription,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sos,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.tene,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateprojectappearsonwebsite,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateofdcoacceptance,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.anticipateddateofsubmission,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateofdcosubmission,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateofrepresentationperiodopen,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateofrelevantrepresentationclose,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.daterrepappearonwebsite,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.confirmedstartofexamination,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datetimeexaminationends,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.stage4extensiontoexamclosedate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.stage5extensiontorecommendationdeadline,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateofrecommendations,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.confirmeddateofdecision,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.stage5extensiontodecisiondeadline,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.dateprojectwithdrawn,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.section46notification,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datepinsfirstnotifiedofproject,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.screeningopinionsought,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.screeningopinionissued,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.scopingopinionsought,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.scopingopinionissued,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.deadlineforacceptancedecision,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datesection58noticereceived,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.deadlineforcloseofexamination,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.preliminarymeetingstartdate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.deadlineforsubmissionofrecommendation,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.deadlinefordecision,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.jrperiodenddate,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.extensiontodaterelevantrepresentationsclose,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.summary,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.promotername,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.applicantfirstname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.applicantlastname,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressline1,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addressline2,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addresstown,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.addresscounty,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.applicantemailaddress,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.applicantwebaddress,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.applicantphonenumber,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.applicantdescriptionofproject,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' 
;

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total amount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the process of loading the data

# Run tests to check integrity of data by comparison of codes
- This script checks for the total list of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the list for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ProjectName,
    ProjectStatus,
    ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
    Sector,
    ProjectType,
    Stage,
    CaseReference,
    ProjectLocation,
    ProjectEmailAddress,
    TwitterAccountName,
    Region,
    Easting,
    Northing,
    Transboundary,
    WelshLanguage,
    ExASize,
    MapZoomLevel,
    ProjectDescription,
    SoS,
    TenE,
    DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
    DateOfDCOAcceptance,
    AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
    DateOfDCOSubmission,
    DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
    DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
    DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
    ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
    DateTimeExaminationEnds,
    Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
    Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
    DateOfRecommendations,
    ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
    Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
    DateProjectWithdrawn,
    Section46Notification,
    DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
    ScreeningOpinionSought,
    ScreeningOpinionIssued,
    ScopingOpinionSought,
    ScopingOpinionIssued,
    DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
    DateSection58NoticeReceived,
    PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
    DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
    DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
    DeadlineForDecision,
    JRPeriodEndDate,
    ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
    Summary,
    PromoterName,
    ApplicantFirstName,
    ApplicantLastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    ApplicantEmailAddress,
    ApplicantWebAddress,
    ApplicantPhoneNumber,
    ApplicantDescriptionOfProject,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    

From casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ProjectName,
    ProjectStatus,
    ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
    Sector,
    ProjectType,
    Stage,
    CaseReference,
    ProjectLocation,
    ProjectEmailAddress,
    TwitterAccountName,
    Region,
    Easting,
    Northing,
    Transboundary,
    WelshLanguage,
    ExASize,
    MapZoomLevel,
    ProjectDescription,
    SoS,
    TenE,
    DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
    DateOfDCOAcceptance,
    AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
    DateOfDCOSubmission,
    DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
    DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
    DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
    ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
    DateTimeExaminationEnds,
    Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
    Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
    DateOfRecommendations,
    ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
    Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
    DateProjectWithdrawn,
    Section46Notification,
    DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
    ScreeningOpinionSought,
    ScreeningOpinionIssued,
    ScopingOpinionSought,
    ScopingOpinionIssued,
    DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
    DateSection58NoticeReceived,
    PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
    DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
    DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
    DeadlineForDecision,
    JRPeriodEndDate,
    ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
    Summary,
    PromoterName,
    ApplicantFirstName,
    ApplicantLastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    ApplicantEmailAddress,
    ApplicantWebAddress,
    ApplicantPhoneNumber,
    ApplicantDescriptionOfProject,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_new WHERE NSIPProjectInfoInternalID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ProjectName,
    ProjectStatus,
    ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
    Sector,
    ProjectType,
    Stage,
    CaseReference,
    ProjectLocation,
    ProjectEmailAddress,
    TwitterAccountName,
    Region,
    Easting,
    Northing,
    Transboundary,
    WelshLanguage,
    ExASize,
    MapZoomLevel,
    ProjectDescription,
    SoS,
    TenE,
    DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
    DateOfDCOAcceptance,
    AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
    DateOfDCOSubmission,
    DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
    DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
    DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
    ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
    DateTimeExaminationEnds,
    Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
    Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
    DateOfRecommendations,
    ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
    Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
    DateProjectWithdrawn,
    Section46Notification,
    DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
    ScreeningOpinionSought,
    ScreeningOpinionIssued,
    ScopingOpinionSought,
    ScopingOpinionIssued,
    DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
    DateSection58NoticeReceived,
    PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
    DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
    DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
    DeadlineForDecision,
    JRPeriodEndDate,
    ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
    Summary,
    PromoterName,
    ApplicantFirstName,
    ApplicantLastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    ApplicantEmailAddress,
    ApplicantWebAddress,
    ApplicantPhoneNumber,
    ApplicantDescriptionOfProject,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim AS Target
USING casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID = Target.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,
        CaseCreatedDate,
        ProjectName,
        ProjectStatus,
        ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
        Sector,
        ProjectType,
        Stage,
        CaseReference,
        ProjectLocation,
        ProjectEmailAddress,
        TwitterAccountName,
        Region,
        Easting,
        Northing,
        Transboundary,
        WelshLanguage,
        ExASize,
        MapZoomLevel,
        ProjectDescription,
        SoS,
        TenE,
        DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
        DateOfDCOAcceptance,
        AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
        DateOfDCOSubmission,
        DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
        DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
        DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
        ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
        DateTimeExaminationEnds,
        Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
        Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
        DateOfRecommendations,
        ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
        Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
        DateProjectWithdrawn,
        Section46Notification,
        DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
        ScreeningOpinionSought,
        ScreeningOpinionIssued,
        ScopingOpinionSought,
        ScopingOpinionIssued,
        DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
        DateSection58NoticeReceived,
        PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
        DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
        DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
        DeadlineForDecision,
        JRPeriodEndDate,
        ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
        Summary,
        PromoterName,
        ApplicantFirstName,
        ApplicantLastName,
        AddressLine1,
        AddressLine2,
        AddressTown,
        AddressCounty,
        PostCode,
        ApplicantEmailAddress,
        ApplicantWebAddress,
        ApplicantPhoneNumber,
        ApplicantDescriptionOfProject,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (

        Source.ProjectName,

        Source.IngestionDate,

        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NSIPProjectInfoInternalID NULLS LAST) AS NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseCreatedDate,
    ProjectName,
    ProjectStatus,
    ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
    Sector,
    ProjectType,
    Stage,
    CaseReference,
    ProjectLocation,
    ProjectEmailAddress,
    TwitterAccountName,
    Region,
    Easting,
    Northing,
    Transboundary,
    WelshLanguage,
    ExASize,

    ProjectDescription,
    SoS,
    TenE,
    DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
    DateOfDCOAcceptance,
    AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
    DateOfDCOSubmission,
    DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
    DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
    DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
    ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
    DateTimeExaminationEnds,
    Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
    Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
    DateOfRecommendations,
    ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
    Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
    DateProjectWithdrawn,
    Section46Notification,
    DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
    ScreeningOpinionSought,
    ScreeningOpinionIssued,
    ScopingOpinionSought,
    ScopingOpinionIssued,
    DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
    DateSection58NoticeReceived,
    PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
    DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
    DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
    DeadlineForDecision,
    JRPeriodEndDate,
    ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
    Summary,
    PromoterName,
    ApplicantFirstName,
    ApplicantLastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    PostCode,
    ApplicantEmailAddress,
    ApplicantWebAddress,
    ApplicantPhoneNumber,
    ApplicantDescriptionOfProject,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim;
